subject: Sprains and Strains
Ankles (Body Part)
Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Tom Brady, who was seen strolling around Manhattan with and without a walking boot while visiting his supermodel girlfriend, Gisele Bundchen, was out of sight during the time reporters were allowed inside the Patriots locker room.
